name: Christmas Holidays!
description:
All orders placed after Saturday 21st December will be shipped on the 2nd January.
Merry Christmas!

name: Coming soon...
description: Keep checking back as there are plenty more lovely things to be added!

name: DING DING Arrow Head Necklace
description: The Arrow Head Necklace is made with hand screen printed 2.7mm thick FSC approved plywood. Each piece is cut and sanded by hand then varnished. Each item is handmade and slightly different. Available in a choice of two colours: yellow or light blue. Limited edition of 50, hand numbered. 46cm silver plated chain. Necklace 10.5cm wide. Designed and lovingly handmade in Nottingham by Jenna Round.

name: DING DING Arrow Necklace
description: The Arrow Necklace is made with hand screen printed 2.7mm FSC approved plywood. Each piece is cut and sanded by hand then varnished. Each item is handmade and slightly different. Limited edition of 50, hand numbered. Available in a choice of two colours: red and yellow. 46cm silver plated chain. Necklace 10.5cm wide. Designed and lovingly handmade in Nottingham by Jenna Round.

name: LUCIE ELLEN Octagon Bangle
description: Made from - Each octagonal bangle is hand cut and finished from a piece of beautiful 6mm plywood, and then hand painted on one side. Two colours to choose from! Mustard or grey. The other side is left as natural wood for contrast. The whole thing is then given a coat of clear varnish for protection. Please be aware that this is a totally handmade item so there may be slight variations from piece to piece and colour may vary from monitor to monitor. Avoid contact with water and perfume! Measurements - Each bangle measures 8cm across, and the hole is 6.5cm Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Lucie Ellen. Lucie Ellen works out of her garden studio in East London. She creates a diverse and ever changing range of jewellery. Her favourite materials are wood and paper. She likes clashing colours and shouting.

name: WOLF & MOON Amulet Necklace
description: The Amulet pendant is made with perspex, wood and brass and hung on a 60cm gold plated chain. Pendant is approx. 5cm by 3cm. Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Hannah Davis. Wolf & Moon is a handcrafted jewellery label by British designer Hannah Davis. Hannah graduated with a degree in Fine Art from Goldsmiths College in 2011, but has always enjoyed crafts and making since an early age, opening her first online shop at the age of 17. Hannah makes a range of jewellery using a combination of perspex, wood and metal. Inspired by art deco, and other retro styles, her intention is to create pieces that are unique and eye-catching yet easily wearable.

name: LAYLA AMBER Wooden Mountain Earrings
description: Part of the Woodland Collection, these mountain earrings have been intricately laser cut in 3mm birch wood. > Measures approx. 1.3 x 1 cm > Silver plated studs and earring backs > Finished with french polish Designed and lovingly handmade in Southwold, Suffolk by Layla Amber Rous. Layla Amber Rous is 24 years old and graduated from Norwich University College of the Arts in 2010 with a BA Hons in Graphic Design. It was during her time at Art School that Layla discovered a passion for illustration. Layla’s objectives have always been simple, to create fun and wearable pieces of jewellery from her finely detailed illustrations. Layla works mainly in plastic, a material that allows her illustrations to retain their intricacy and vibrancy in a miniature format.

name: LAYLA AMBER Wooden Fox Earrings
description: Part of the Woodland Collection, these fox earrings have been intricately laser cut in 3mm birch wood. > Measures approx. 1.5 x 1 cm > Silver plated studs and earring backs > Finished with french polish Designed and lovingly handmade in Southwold, Suffolk by Layla Amber Rous. Layla Amber Rous is 24 years old and graduated from Norwich University College of the Arts in 2010 with a BA Hons in Graphic Design. It was during her time at Art School that Layla discovered a passion for illustration. Layla’s objectives have always been simple, to create fun and wearable pieces of jewellery from her finely detailed illustrations. Layla works mainly in plastic, a material that allows her illustrations to retain their intricacy and vibrancy in a miniature format.

name: LAYLA AMBER Wooden Fox Necklace
description: Part of the Woodland Collection, this sleeping fox necklace has been intricately laser cut in 3mm birch wood. The fox measures approx. 6 x 4 cm. The chain has an antique gold finish and measures 24" long. Designed and lovingly handmade in Southwold, Suffolk by Layla Amber Rous. Layla Amber Rous is 24 years old and graduated from Norwich University College of the Arts in 2010 with a BA Hons in Graphic Design. It was during her time at Art School that Layla discovered a passion for illustration. Layla’s objectives have always been simple, to create fun and wearable pieces of jewellery from her finely detailed illustrations. Layla works mainly in plastic, a material that allows her illustrations to retain their intricacy and vibrancy in a miniature format.

name: OH MY CLUMSY HEART Francine Necklace
description: A row of seven gold plated tubes strung along a soft pink nylon cord. A lightweight, minimal necklace ideal for layering and daily wear. Length: 26 inches Designed and lovingly handmade in Kent by Sophie Davies. Oh My Clumsy Heart provides fine Jewellery pieces, designed and handmade in the United Kingdom. Created with a passion for exceptional adornments. Oh My Clumsy Heart blends minimal, classic design with modern style. All Sophie's feature high quality metals, reclaimed vintage discoveries, natural stones and/or crystals. Oh My Clumsy Heart embraces ethical sourcing methods.

name: OH MY CLUMSY HEART Bernadette Necklace
description: A row of seven gold plated tubes strung along a lilac nylon cord. A lightweight, minimal necklace ideal for layering and daily wear. name: OH MY CLUMSY HEART Ida Necklace
description: Dainty 24K gold vermeil cubes (3mm in size) strung upon a 14K gold filled chain finished with a gold spring ring clasp. A stunning necklace ideal for everyday wear. Designed and lovingly handmade in Kent by Sophie Davies. Oh My Clumsy Heart provides fine Jewellery pieces, designed and handmade in the United Kingdom. Created with a passion for exceptional adornments. Oh My Clumsy Heart blends minimal, classic design with modern style. name: OH MY CLUMSY HEART Millicent Necklace
description: A silver coated raw natural quartz pendant suspended from a 925 sterling silver chain. (please note that each natural stone is uniquely different, please expect slight variations in size and shape from those pictured) Designed and lovingly handmade in Kent by Sophie Davies. name: REBECCA BOATFIELD Small Wooden Triangle Ear Studs
description: Small engraved cherry wood triangle studs with gold filled ear fixings Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Rebecca Boatfield. Rebecca Boatfield is a contemporary jewellery and multi media designer currently based in our beautiful county of Oxfordshire. After graduating, with a First Class Honours degree for Multi-media textiles at Loughborough University, Rebecca has focused on jewellery design and also finds time to work in print and multi-media. Inspired by surrealism against reality and organic and angular forms, Rebecca creates wearable art that is visually stunning. Her aim is to give you something that will become a treasured gift or possession.

name: UNCOMMONLY BEAUTIFUL Deco Bracelet
description: Art Deco inspired bracelet by Uncommonly Beautiful, with wood and gold tone finishing and an adjustable chain. 21cm Chain Recycled materials (Metal/wood) Designed and lovingly handmade in East London by Kirsty Kirkpatrick. Kirkpatrick trained in Constructed Textiles at Duncan of Jordanstone School of Art and Design, Dundee, where she achieved a BDes(hons). Then studied at Central Saint Martins College of Art & Design, London, graduating with a Postgraduate Diploma in Textile 4 Futures. With an architectural background in project management and lighting design these experiences influence her design. Her fashion accessory pieces demonstrate an imaginative approach to transforming waste into something covetable and unique. Using found furniture, upcycling and recycled materials, the label creates beautiful and fresh products from the overlooked.

name: UNCOMMONLY BEAUTIFUL Round Striped Stud Earrings
description: Etched wooden studs,with a green or black stripe pattern. Made from recycled and sustainable wood, attached to 925 sterling silver backs. Nickel free. Measures 2cm diameter. Designed and lovingly handmade in East London by Kirsty Kirkpatrick. Kirkpatrick trained in Constructed Textiles at Duncan of Jordanstone School of Art and Design, Dundee, where she achieved a BDes(hons). Then studied at Central Saint Martins College of Art & Design, London, graduating with a Postgraduate Diploma in Textile 4 Futures. Her fashion accessory pieces demonstrate an imaginative approach to transforming waste into something covetable and unique. Using found furniture, upcycling and recycled materials, the label creates beautiful and fresh products from the overlooked.

name: PHILLIP J JONES Tea Bear Print
description: Tea Bear Print. Printed onto 100% recycled Mohawk via felt. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Phillip J Jones. Phillip is a freelance illustrator working in Oxford. He graduated 2 years ago from Bath Spa with a high 2:1 in Graphic Communication where he specialised in Illustration and old age print making.

description: Headdress Print. Printed onto 100% recycled Mohawk via felt. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Phillip J Jones. Phillip is a freelance illustrator working in Oxford. He graduated 2 years ago from Bath Spa with a high 2:1 in Graphic Communication where he specialised in Illustration and old age print making.

name: TWO BIRDS TEXTILES Flower Power Cushion Cover
description: Fantastic hand sewn cushion cover made from retro floral fabric (does not include inner pad) Will fit a 12" x 12" feather cushion Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Tillie and Sarah of Two Birds Textiles. Two Birds Textiles are an Oxford-based duo that make happy accessories for you and your home. They love vintage fabrics, retro graphics, woodland animals, red lipstick and cups of tea.

name: SIMON PEPLOW Colourful Vortex Print
description: A4 Size 5 colour digital print on 100% recycled card stock Designed and lovingly handmade in Birmingham by Simon Peplow. Simon is a Birmingham based illustrator and self-professed Visual Tinkerer. He says of his work: "I still try to remain within a delicately constructed vortex. Spending the majority of my days downloading information from a tiny cabin situated inside the Corpus Callosum region of my noggin. Characters are a fundamental part of my work, described by some as whimsical, cute and sinister in equal measures. I just wish they were my chums."

name: BECI CALLOW Green Deer Animal Pillow
description: Sleepy green deer pillow, hand lino printed onto cotton and hand sewn. They are roughly 10"x 6" but each one will vary very slightly. Designed and lovingly handmade in Brighton by Beci Callow. Beci is a design student who makes decorative little animal cushions and zines in her spare time

name: BECI CALLOW Circus Lion Animal Pillow
description: Hand made circus lion cushion, lovely decorative pillow perfect for the young and the young at heart (he has little pom poms attached to his hat though, so not suitable for the very young!). Each pillow is hand printed with specially made lino prints. Roughly 5 or 6 inches tall Designed and lovingly handmade in Brighton by Beci Callow. Beci is a design student who makes decorative little animal cushions and zines in her spare time

name: OLIVIA STREATFEILD-JAMES Red Deer Stag Ipad Sleeve
description: This is a handmade and hand screen printed ipad sleeve, made with Scottish linen and lined with thick cream wool. It has a fabric loop and metal fastener to keep your ipad in place. Designed and lovingly handmade in Scotland by Olivia Streatfeild-James. Olivia is a Printed Textile Designer and Printmaker who enjoys working with Lino and screen printing onto natural fabrics such as Linen and wool. Her inspiration comes from the rural landscape and wildlife around her home in Scotland. She graduated from Loughborough University in 2011 with a 1st Class Honours degree in Printed Textiles. Then she attended New Designers in London where she was awarded The Selvedge award for Excellence in Textiles from Selvedge Magazine.

name: OLIVIA STREATFEILD-JAMES Sandy-Leveret Ipad Sleeve
description: This is a handmade and hand screen printed ipad sleeve, made with Scottish linen and lined with a choice of either thick cream or orange wool. It has a fabric loop and metal fastener to keep your ipad in place. Designed and lovingly handmade in Scotland by Olivia Streatfeild-James. Olivia is a Printed Textile Designer and Printmaker who enjoys working with Lino and screen printing onto natural fabrics such as Linen and wool. Her inspiration comes from the rural landscape and wildlife around her home in Scotland. She graduated from Loughborough University in 2011 with a 1st Class Honours degree in Printed Textiles. Then she attended New Designers in London where she was awarded The Selvedge award for Excellence in Textiles from Selvedge Magazine.

name: OLIVIA STREATFEILD-JAMES Rabbit Bag
description: This is a very cute hand screen printed natural cotton shopper with long handles and 10cm gusset printed with the Rabbit design. 38x43cm Designed and lovingly handmade in Scotland by Olivia Streatfeild-James. Olivia is a Printed Textile Designer and Printmaker who enjoys working with Lino and screen printing onto natural fabrics such as Linen and wool. Her inspiration comes from the rural landscape and wildlife around her home in Scotland. She graduated from Loughborough University in 2011 with a 1st Class Honours degree in Printed Textiles. name: OLIVIA STREATFEILD-JAMES Dorlach Bag
description: This is a lovely hand screen printed natural cotton shopper with long handles and 10cm gusset printed with the Dorlach design. 38x43cm (Moss-Side Dorlach is the Highland Stallion at the Erray stud on the Isle of Mull, Scotland.) Designed and lovingly handmade in Scotland by Olivia Streatfeild-James. Olivia is a Printed Textile Designer and Printmaker who enjoys working with Lino and screen printing onto natural fabrics such as Linen and wool. name: OLIVIA STREATFEILD-JAMES Mens Wolf T-Shirt
description: Hand screen-printed soft 100% cotton jersey t-shirt. Printed with Wolf design and available in white with black print. Available in Small or Medium Designed and lovingly handmade in Scotland by Olivia Streatfeild-James. Olivia is a Printed Textile Designer and Printmaker who enjoys working with Lino and screen printing onto natural fabrics such as Linen and wool. Her inspiration comes from the rural landscape and wildlife around her home in Scotland. She graduated from Loughborough University in 2011 with a 1st Class Honours degree in Printed Textiles. Then she attended New Designers in London where she was awarded The Selvedge award for Excellence in Textiles from Selvedge Magazine.

name: A ALICIA Plait Necklace
description: Six knitted cords, handmade from organic fairtrade cotton, plaited together to form a beautifully textured, easy to wear, statement necklace. Pale Grey necklace tied with soft vintage ribbon in dusky blue. Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Anna Alicia. Anna Alicia took a round-about route to accessory design, via a degree in Art History at the University of Kent and an MA in Fine Art at Central St Martins, London. Her background in Art History and Fine Art plays a huge role in inspiring her collections, as do the travels of her childhood, and the buzz of living and working in London. Alongside these influences, Anna Alicia also explores a fascination with historical craft and particularly Japanese craft and design. Ethical and environmental concerns are central to her collections – all A Alicia accessories are made by hand in Anna Alicia’s London studio, using fairtrade organic cotton and vintage elements wherever possible. Far from finding it restrictive, Anna Alicia feels that working with limited materials inspires her to make the most of their possibilities.

name: A ALICIA Eagle Necklace
description: Gorgeous Dusk Blue hand-knitted and stitched necklace, made using organic fairtrade cotton and finished with stunning vintage brass chain. Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Anna Alicia. Anna Alicia took a round-about route to accessory design, via a degree in Art History at the University of Kent and an MA in Fine Art at Central St Martins, London. Her background in Art History and Fine Art plays a huge role in inspiring her collections, as do the travels of her childhood, and the buzz of living and working in London. Alongside these influences, Anna Alicia also explores a fascination with historical craft and particularly Japanese craft and design. Ethical and environmental concerns are central to her collections – all A Alicia accessories are made by hand in Anna Alicia’s London studio, using fairtrade organic cotton and vintage elements wherever possible. Far from finding it restrictive, Anna Alicia feels that working with limited materials inspires her to make the most of their possibilities.

name: DOWSE Gold Feather Brooch
description: Small brass etched feather brooch. Designed and lovingly handmade in Brighton by Susannah Dowse. Dowse Design is the design company of Susannah Dowse. Born in Berlin and having grown up in the U.S and Germany she now lives in Brighton where Dowse Design is based. Producing carefully designed and thoughtfully made etched jewellery, screen prints and lifestyle products all made in Britain. Her design background lies mainly in fashion and print design, with previous clients such as Topman, Boxfresh and Wayne Hemingway, for whom she produced a range of bespoke millinery. She was Head Designer at the award-winning Remade label which she set up for recycled textile charity TRAID and has lectured in fashion design and sustainable design at the University of Portsmouth and Winchester School of Art.

name: DOWSE Large Silver Bow Necklace
description: 'Clara' large etched grosgrain ribbon bow necklace. Stainless steel bow hangs on a sterling silver chain. The bow itself is 3.5 inches wide and 2 inches tall but the length of the whole necklace including the chain (as it would hang on the neck) is 9.5 inches. Designed and lovingly handmade in Brighton by Susannah Dowse. Dowse Design is the design company of Susannah Dowse. Born in Berlin and having grown up in the U.S and Germany she now lives in Brighton where Dowse Design is based. name: DOWSE Small Gold Bow Necklace
description: 'Twill' etched grosgrain ribbon bow necklace. The bow is made from brass and hangs on sterling silver chain. name: WOLF & MOON Deco Necklace
description: Geometric shards of coloured and mirrored perspex in a deco design necklace. Various colours. (the silver, blue and gold glitter pendant comes on a 50cm silver chain and the purple, red and gold glitter pendant comes on a 50cm gold plated chain) Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Hannah Davis. Wolf & Moon is a handcrafted jewellery label by British designer Hannah Davis. Hannah graduated with a degree in Fine Art from Goldsmiths College in 2011, but has always enjoyed crafts and making since an early age, opening her first online shop at the age of 17. Hannah makes a range of jewellery using a combination of perspex, wood and metal. Inspired by art deco, and other retro styles, her intention is to create pieces that are unique and eye-catching yet easily wearable.

name: WOLF & MOON Diamond Brooch
description: Perspex diamond shaped brooch. Inlaid with geometric shapes in different colours (Purple, Gold, White and Maroon) Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Hannah Davis. name: LOVELY PIGEON 'Triangle' Necklace
description: Triangle necklace in panels of Baby Blue, Navy and Grey. Illustrated, printed, heat shrunk and lacquered. Hung on a gold plated 44cm chain. The triangle measures 6cm on the longest edge. Designed and lovingly handmade in Cellardyke, Scotland by Kirsty Thomas. Kirsty Thomas is an illustrator, printmaker and occasional shopkeeper. Her studio, Lovely Pigeon, produces hand-crafted jewellery, paper products and printed homewares. The Pigeon is inspired by block colour, geometry, the circus, type, vintage finds, sea skies, sailing boats and… pigeons. Kirsty lives and works in Cellardyke, a fishing village on the East Coast of Scotland. Her studio is in an old net loft and she often gets distracted by the view.

name: LOVELY PIGEON 'Spliced' Necklace
description: A geometric neckpiece with spliced panels of Navy, Baby Blue and Pale Grey. Illustrated, printed, heat shrunk, lacquered and finished with a silver plated 44cm chain. Necklace measures approximately 51cm in circumference. Designed and lovingly handmade in Cellardyke, Scotland by Kirsty Thomas. Kirsty Thomas is an illustrator, printmaker and occasional shopkeeper. Her studio, Lovely Pigeon, produces hand-crafted jewellery, paper products and printed homewares. The Pigeon is inspired by block colour, geometry, the circus, type, vintage finds, sea skies, sailing boats and… pigeons. Kirsty lives and works in Cellardyke, a fishing village on the East Coast of Scotland. Her studio is in an old net loft and she often gets distracted by the view.

name: LOVELY PIGEON 'Triangle' Brooch
description: Orange, Sky Blue and White panelled triangle brooch. Illustrated, printed, heat shrunk, lacquered and finished with a nickel brooch pin. The triangle measures 6cm on its longest edge. Designed and lovingly handmade in Cellardyke, Scotland by Kirsty Thomas. Kirsty Thomas is an illustrator, printmaker and occasional shopkeeper. Kirsty lives and works in Cellardyke, a fishing village on the East Coast of Scotland. Her studio is in an old net loft and she often gets distracted by the view.

name: LOVELY PIGEON 'Circle' Earrings
description: Pigeometry circle earrings with mismatched panels of colour (yellow, sky blue and white) Illustrated, printed, heat shrunk, lacquered and finished with silver plated ear studs. Each circle measures approx 10mm in diameter. Designed and lovingly handmade in Cellardyke, Scotland by Kirsty Thomas. Kirsty Thomas is an illustrator, printmaker and occasional shopkeeper. Her studio, Lovely Pigeon, produces hand-crafted jewellery, paper products and printed homewares. The Pigeon is inspired by block colour, geometry, the circus, type, vintage finds, sea skies, sailing boats and… pigeons. Kirsty lives and works in Cellardyke, a fishing village on the East Coast of Scotland. Her studio is in an old net loft and she often gets distracted by the view.

name: CUSTOM MADE 'Tiny Triangle' Studs
description: These tiny brass triangle studs measure 7mm wide and are mounted on sterling silver posts. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Anna Butler. Anna says: "I design and make all manner of accessories including bags, purses and jewelry. I use a mixture of new and vintage fabrics and materials. I am inspired by colour, colour and more colour, pretty prints from far off places, imaginary creatures, ace charms, vintage fabric & trimmings, stationary and lovely fonts. When I am not creating wonderful things I am thinking about creating wonderful things. My head is full of making!"

name: CUSTOM MADE 'Arrow To The Heart' Necklace
description: An arrow, heart and lightening bolt hang on a pretty gold plated chain. The arrow measures 4.5cm long, the heart measures 2cm wide and the cute lightening bolt is just over 2.5cm long. Total length of the necklace including the charms is 61cm. The charms are brass. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Anna Butler. Anna says: "I design and make all manner of accessories including bags, purses and jewelry. I use a mixture of new and vintage fabrics and materials. I am inspired by colour, colour and more colour, pretty prints from far off places, imaginary creatures, ace charms, vintage fabric & trimmings, stationary and lovely fonts. When I am not creating wonderful things I am thinking about creating wonderful things. My head is full of making!"

name: CUSTOM MADE 'Chase me' Bracelet
description: This little brass swallow hangs on a sturdy 2mm gold plated trace chain. Swallow measures 18mm long. Total length of the bracelet is 17.5cm. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Anna Butler. Anna says: "I design and make all manner of accessories including bags, purses and jewelry. I use a mixture of new and vintage fabrics and materials. I am inspired by colour, colour and more colour, pretty prints from far off places, imaginary creatures, ace charms, vintage fabric & trimmings, stationary and lovely fonts. When I am not creating wonderful things I am thinking about creating wonderful things. My head is full of making!"

name: CUSTOM MADE 'Chase me' Studs
description: These lovely little brass swallow studs are mounted on a sterling silver post. They measure approx 18mm across. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Anna Butler. Anna says: "I design and make all manner of accessories including bags, purses and jewelry. I use a mixture of new and vintage fabrics and materials. I am inspired by colour, colour and more colour, pretty prints from far off places, imaginary creatures, ace charms, vintage fabric & trimmings, stationary and lovely fonts. When I am not creating wonderful things I am thinking about creating wonderful things. My head is full of making!"

name: JULIE DE GRUCHY EAST Hairy Legs Screen Printed Tote Bag
description:
<b>Check out this adorable screen printed tote bag.
Is it a pair of bear legs strutting her stuff in lush red stilettos? or a pair of rather hairy lady's legs? or has someone or something come along and sprinkled hundreds and thousands onto them?

Length: 43cm / 17"
Width: 37cm / 14"
Length of handles: 32cm / 12"<b>

Designed and lovingly handmade in Cheltenham by Julie de Gruchy East.

Julie says: "The people I meet inspire me. I love making my 'anthropomorphic dolls - especially their faces and hair... this is when they start to become striking little individuals. Photo shooting is also fun as this really brings my unique characters to life. The rewarding aspect of my work has to be when they are enjoyed by others, yeah.... bringing a smile to someones face makes my day."

name: MADE BY LOULABELLE  ‘Amelia’ Turquoise & Pink Vintage Fabric Resin Frame Clutch
description: The ‘Amelia’ clutch is handmade using repurposed vintage fabric. The elegant clutch bag shape is off-set by an eye-catching chunky frame in high shine black resin. The size is approx 11” by 8” Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Verity Warne. By day Verity works for an academic publisher, by night (and weekends and any other spare moments) she makes the bags and other accessories you see here. She loves using vintage or vintage inspired fabrics to make something beautiful, unique - and useful!

name: MADE BY LOULABELLE ‘Kitty’ Purple Vintage Fabric Clutch
description: The ‘Kitty’ clutch is handmade using repurposed vintage fabric. This well-proportioned clutch closes with a glossy silver kiss-lock frame and has a handy pocket in the lining. Interfaced to give extra body and firmness. The size is approx 11” by 7” Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Verity Warne. By day Verity works for an academic publisher, by night (and weekends and any other spare moments) she makes the bags and other accessories you see here. She loves using vintage or vintage inspired fabrics to make something beautiful, unique - and useful!

name: MADE BY LOULABELLE ‘Kitty’ Yellow Vintage Fabric Clutch
description: The ‘Kitty’ clutch is handmade using repurposed vintage fabric. This well-proportioned clutch closes with a glossy silver kiss-lock frame and has a handy pocket in the lining. Interfaced to give extra body and firmness. The size is approx 11” by 7” Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Verity Warne. By day Verity works for an academic publisher, by night (and weekends and any other spare moments) she makes the bags and other accessories you see here. She loves using vintage or vintage inspired fabrics to make something beautiful, unique - and useful!

name: ALISON BRENT Ceramic Leopard Necklace
description: Handmade ceramic necklace made with a mixture of coloured earthenware slips and decorated with a clear glaze and enamel leopard illustration. The chain is a Vermeil (18kt gold plated sterling silver) box chain 18 inches in length. It is threaded through a gold plaited bail on the back on the necklace. Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Alison Brent. Alison Brent studied Ceramic Design at Central Saint Martins College, London, England, where she graduated with a BA Hons Degree. Since graduating Alison has worked within the fields of bronze casting and antique restoration as well as creating her own lines of ceramic homeware and unique ceramic necklaces. Her work has achieved international press.

name: ALISON BRENT Ceramic Zebra Necklace
description: Handmade ceramic necklace made with a mixture of coloured earthenware slips and decorated with a clear glaze and enamel zebra illustration. The chain is a sterling silver box chain 18 inches in length and has been patinated to give it an aged vintage appearance. It is threaded through a silver plated bail on the back on the necklace. Designed and lovingly handmade in London by Alison Brent. Alison Brent studied Ceramic Design at Central Saint Martins College, London, England, where she graduated with a BA Hons Degree. Since graduating Alison has worked within the fields of bronze casting and antique restoration as well as creating her own lines of ceramic homeware and unique ceramic necklaces. Her work has achieved international press.

name: TWO BIRDS TEXTILES Brown & Orange Vintage Owl Plushie
description: Made from floral Vintage 1970s Cotton. He measures approx 6" by 6". His eyes and beak are made from hand stitched felt. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Tillie and Sarah of Two Birds Textiles. Two Birds Textiles are an Oxford-based duo that make happy accessories for you and your home. They love vintage fabrics, retro graphics, woodland animals, red lipstick and cups of tea.

name: TWO BIRDS TEXTILES Baby Blue Vintage Owl Plushie
description: Made from velvet soft baby blue Corduroy with a Vintage 1970s Cotton back. He measures approx 6" by 6". His eyes and beak are made from hand stitched felt. Designed and lovingly handmade in Oxford by Tillie and Sarah of Two Birds Textiles. Two Birds Textiles are an Oxford-based duo that make happy accessories for you and your home. They love vintage fabrics, retro graphics, woodland animals, red lipstick and cups of tea.
